examples.translation: 私は彼が盗みをしたのではないかと疑っている。
何を疑っているのか？ / 何を推測しているのか？

collocations: aliquem de re suspicari (～のことで誰かを疑う)
male/bene suspicari (悪く/良く推測する)

etymology.value: Proto-Italic *spectāō (“to look at”), frequentative of *spek- (“to see, observe”).

verb_forms.present_active_indicative: suspicor, suspicaris, suspicatur, suspicamur, suspicamini, suspicantur
verb_forms.imperfect_active_indicative: suspicabar, suspicabaris, suspicabatur, suspicabamur, suspicabamini, suspicabantur
verb_forms.future_active_indicative: suspicabor, suspicaberis, suspicabitur, suspicabimur, suspicabimini, suspicabuntur
verb_forms.perfect_active_indicative: suspicatus sum, suspicatus es, suspicatus est, suspicati sumus, suspicati estis, suspicati sunt
verb_forms.pluperfect_active_indicative: suspicatus eram, suspicatus eras, suspicatus erat, suspicati eramus, suspicati eratis, suspicati erant
verb_forms.future_perfect_active_indicative: suspicatus ero, suspicatus eris, suspicatus erit, suspicati erimus, suspicati eritis, suspicati erunt
verb_forms.present_active_subjunctive: suspicer, suspiceris, suspicatur, suspicamur, suspicamini, suspicantur
verb_forms.imperfect_active_subjunctive: suspicarem, suspicares, suspicaret, suspicaremus, suspicaretis, suspicarent
verb_forms.perfect_active_subjunctive: suspicatus sim, suspicatus sis, suspicatus sit, suspicati simus, suspicati sitis, suspicati sint
verb_forms.pluperfect_active_subjunctive: suspicatus essem, suspicatus esses, suspicatus esset, suspicati essemus, suspicati essetis, suspicati essent

usage_notes.explanation: suspicari はラテン語の動詞で、「疑う」「推測する」という意味を持ちます。能動態で使われることは稀で、主に受動態または再帰的に用いられます。

derivatives: suspiciosus (形容詞: 疑わしい、用心深い)
